title: Disregarding US Sanctions, India Continues to Buy Russian Crude
summary: India continues to buy cheap Russian crude oil, despite being punished for it by the United States, which in August imposed a 50 percent tariff on Indian exports to America, including a 25 percent penalty for importing Russian crude. The US tariffs on India are some of the highest in the world. Cit…

title: Job Cuts Rock Global Oil and Gas Sector
summary: Oil and gas producers worldwide are bracing for a prolonged downturn, with job losses and investment cuts spreading through the industry, according to a new report from Financial Times. title: Autumn Winds Crucial for European Clean Energy Targets
summary: Europe will have to rely on higher wind speeds this autumn to see a rise in annual clean power generation as electricity output from wind slumped earlier this year and solar passed its yearly peak in the summer. title: EIA Reports Significant Build in U.S. Crude Stockpiles
summary: Crude oil inventories in the United States increased by 3.9 million barrels during the week ending September 5, after falling 2.4 million barrels in the week prior, according to new data from the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) released on Wednesday.
